product_name: Planet Bike Cascadia Road Bike Fenders - 35mm
long_description: The Cascadia Road bike fenders are the top-of-the-line edition from Planet Bike. The width fits mosts road bikes with 700c wheels. Made from unbreakable, all-weather polycarbonate material; 130mm mud flaps provide excellent coverage. V-stays add stability. Compatible with disc brakes. Release tabs on front fender stays allow front fender to automatically release if something gets caught between the tire and fender. Quick-adjust stainless-steel hardware is pre-intalled for hassle-free mounting. Includes necessary hardware and fits most bikes; instructions included.
short_description: The Cascadia Road bike fenders are the top-of-the-line edition from Planet Bike. The width fits mosts road bikes with 700c wheels.
